content: उद्ग्रह् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To take up, lift up; शक्तिं चोग्रामुदग्रहीत् <ls>Bk. 15. 52</ls>; elevate, erect, raise; उद्गृहीतालकांताः <ls>Me. 8.</ls> {@--2@} To take or draw out, take away. {@--3@} To deposit. {@--4@} To preserve. {@--5@} To cease (to rain). {@--6@} To break off, discontinue (speaking). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to take up, or out; cause to pay. {@--2@} To state, place before, adduce; विशेषविदुषः शास्त्रं यत्तवोद्ग्राह्यते पुरः <ls>Śi. 2. 75.</ls> {@--3@} To extol, laud up.
